mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(board_no, writer, title, content, view_cnt) VALUES(seq_board.nextval, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, #{viewCnt})
mapper.select: SELECT board_no, writer, title, content, view_cnt FROM (SELECT /* +INDEX DESC(board pk_board) */ rownum rn, board_no, writer, title, content, view_cnt FROM board WHERE rownum <= #{page} * #{amount}) WHERE rn > (#{page}-1) * #{amount}

SELECT board_no, writer, title, content, view_cnt FROM (SELECT /* +INDEX DESC(board pk_board) */ rownum rn, board_no, writer, title, content, view_cnt FROM board WHERE
title LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' AND
writer LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' AND
content LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' AND
(title LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR content '%' || #{keyword} || '%') AND
rownum <= #{page} * #{amount} ) WHERE rn > (#{page}-1) * #{amount}
